message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. I believe it could be a great addition to your collection. Let me know if you're interested, and I'll share the details.
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is there any flexibility on the price?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle and set the price at $85? This still allows us both to benefit from the transaction.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $85. Would you be willing to consider $78? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob. Let's try $82. It's a bit closer to your initial offer, but still reflects the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $82 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $78, so how about $79? I'm really interested in making a deal, but I need to stick to my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. How about we settle at $80? This brings us right to your maximum offer, and it also aligns with my target price.
